item.title: Oneonta & Multnomah
item.description:
Oneonta & Multnomah

Fun times at Oneonta Gorge and Multnomah Falls, two beautiful outdoor attractions of Oregon. Shot on GH4 with Lumix 20mm f/1.7 lens. Music: "Gathering" by Keith Kenniff The music is unlicensed and has been altered from the original. You can listen to more of artist's music at: www.unseen-music.com/library

item.title: Michael Bryant - Cinematography Demo 2015
item.description:
Michael Bryant - Cinematography Demo 2015

A highlight of my recent camera work. Shot with Panasonic GH4, AF100; Canon EOSM; Sony EA50.

item.title: SOU Film Club - Damn, What a Dame
item.description:
SOU Film Club - Damn, What a Dame

The SOU Film Club produced this short film as a 2-part bumper for the '15 Student Film Fest.

item.title: SOU Film Club - Damn, What a Dame

SOU Film Club - Damn, What a Dame

The SOU Film Club produced this short film as a 2-part bumper for the '15 Student Film Fest.

item.title: 19th Annual Ho'opa'a Hawai'i Club Lū'au - Full Highlight
item.description:
19th Annual Ho'opa'a Hawai'i Club Lū'au - Full Highlight

Southern Oregon University's 19th Annual Ho'opa'a Hawai'i Club Lū'au. This is dedicated to the 'Ohana in each of our lives that made it possible to be where we are today. Many thanks to Adam Hobbs, Dylan Moore, and Rob Wilkins for their work and support to produce this highlight.

item.title: SOFaM - Highlight Reel 2015
item.description:
SOFaM - Highlight Reel 2015

Edited for Southern Oregon Film and Media 2016 Kickoff Celebration. Less of a highlight and more of a demonstration of the immense talent and beauty located in Southern Oregon. Music by Michael Paul Caruso

item.title: Raider Club Auction - 2016
item.description:
Raider Club Auction - 2016

A video for Southern Oregon University's Raider Club Auction to support student-athlete scholarships.
